# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an instance of the observation registrar.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

You don’t need to create an instance of [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Observation/ObservationRegistrar] when using the [doc://com.apple.Swift/documentation/Observation/Observable()] macro to indicate observably of a type.
title: init()
